tool_description: Creates visual progress charts and graphs showing developmental trajectory over time across multiple domains and assessment periods.

chart_type.description: Type of chart to generate: line_graph, bar_chart, milestone_timeline, percentile_curve

time_range_months.description: Number of months of data to include (1-36)

domains_to_chart.description: Domains to include: cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, adaptive, overall

include_predictions.description: Whether to include projected future progress

error_messages: Invalid profile ID: Profile not found in system
Invalid chart type: Use line_graph, bar_chart, milestone_timeline, or percentile_curve
Invalid time range: Must be between 1 and 36 months
Invalid domain: Use cognitive, language, motor, social-emotional, adaptive, or overall
Insufficient data: Need at least 2 data points to generate meaningful charts
usage: Generate visual representations of developmental progress by selecting chart type, time range, and domains. Charts help identify trends and communicate progress.

chart_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated chart

chart_url.description: URL or path to the generated chart image

data_points_used.description: Number of assessment data points included in chart

trend_analysis.description: Brief description of overall developmental trends shown

notable_patterns.description: Significant patterns or changes identified in the data
